attributes.title: Glitched phone
attributes.review: This app is terrible, I downloaded it today to find a reason to support this man but this app just made it worse. GET RID OF IT. It gave my phone a terrible virus. But I guess if I say that the man would say it’s from China again 😒. I don’t suggest downloading this app nor supporting this man. 1 STAR.

attributes.title: The app is terrible
attributes.review: First of all it’s Donald trump a racist and a rapist. No reason to like him another thing is it took way to long to down load another thing is , is that when it downloaded it made my phone completely stop working it has a virus!

attributes.title: Not a Christian
attributes.review:
This app is super confusing and misleading. Once I downloaded it I kept getting a bunch of texts and calls - they clearly sold my data and don’t care about my security. And I thought he was going to build a wall to protect my security?? Smh. 

Wake up Christians - Trump is not a Christian

attributes.title: Why tho?
attributes.review: Donald trump is taking most of peoples entertainment away in America, Tik Tok. Donald should have known what that could do to his campaign and how many people in America won't vote for him. I am mad how he is taking away something from the people of America that make them happy, and expect them to vote for him.

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: This is just a terrible app. Who in their right mind would want to vote for a racist Cheeto who built a wall in Mexico for no reason at all. Also he is a bad influence to others after all those times he has been racist. I personally think this is a no no app. 👎

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review:
This app is so horrible!! not only did it glitch my phone, leading to the spread of a virus on my electronic device but it made my phone incapable of turning on directly upon download!!!! If you are a human being with half a brain (and especially if you are a trump supporter) do NOT get this app!!

-Karen Jones, Alabama 

#herefromtiktok

attributes.title: What is happening to me
attributes.review: This app was glitching and it even took a day to download they also said that there where to many people online for myself to get on the sight I've just looks at the reviews and someone got attacked🤜🏻😑 because of this app

attributes.title: app kept crashing 🤬😡
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to see what all of the fuss was about. i knew the youngsters on tikky tok were mad that their app may be deleted, so i thought all of the one star reviews were just from them. to my surprise, the second i opened the app it crashed! i tried turning my phone on and off, putting it in rice, and eventually hitting it with a hammer. nothing would stop the app from crashing. i’m so disappointed in my president for creating such a malfunctioning app.

attributes.title: Ugh!
attributes.review: Horibble trump always wants to joke around like he did about the death of George floyd when his jokes aren’t funny and doesn’t do his job instead he’s worried of people exposing him  go do your own job and start being a better president then people might stop exposing you
